about_the_game:
Turbo Live is a party game where you have to survive in a world where drivers follow no rules. The game's premise is simple: you must guide a group of slightly dumb and clumsy pedestrians through traffic jams without getting them run over.

Turbo Live can be played solo like an arcade game, or live with your community as a party game. It's your choice.

  • 🚶‍♂️ Save or crush the pedestrians
  • 🚗 Send cars on the road or from the skies to crush the pedestrians
  • 🔔 Interact with your community or your favorite streamers
  • 💥 Combine commands and imagine the most twisted strategies to create chaos!



Are you a streamer looking to play with your community? Turbo Live is the ultimate party game to spice up your Twitch sessions. Save the pedestrians or run them over via chat, in co-op or versus mode. Grow your audience, have fun, and create bonds during chaotic and unforgettable sessions! GO, GO, GO, TURBOOOOOOO LIVE!!!

🎮 Tons of Game Modes




In Turbo Live, the goal is to either crush or save the pedestrians. So far, nothing too complicated. But the game modes add a twist, a challenge, and can even completely turn the experience upside down. Imagine playing street soccer in the middle of a traffic jam. Scoring goals while avoiding getting hit won't be easy. Of course, you'll have access to several different game modes (survival, zero crash, soccer, etc.), and more are coming soon (werewolf, zombie, etc.).

🎲 Embrace the Chaos




Can you imagine giving full control to your community? Via the chat, viewers can use tons of commands to play, react, help, sabotage, troll, and support you if they're nice. And as if that wasn't enough, we've also planned random events combined with unpredictable physics to surprise you and create completely absurd situations. But don't worry! You have access to settings to customize your experience and ensure everything runs the way you want it to.

✨ Simple and Accessible




Have you ever tried playing with your community but gave up because you had to explain the rules a million times? Relax! We've got you covered. Turbo Live is designed so that anyone (even your great-aunt) can join the game midway without needing explanations. The game's rules and commands are always visible on the screen to make everything super accessible. And to top it off, we've programmed a Twitch bot that gives tips to viewers without cluttering the chat.

The main goal is to have fun. Or to make sure your stream goes well and stays dynamic. We definitely want to avoid situations where you're lost in incomprehensible menus and billions of settings. No problem, just start the game, and you can easily connect to your Twitch account from within the game. And don't worry, you don't need to be a pro gamer or a streamer with 1,000,000 followers. You just need a mouse, a decent computer (preferably not from the '80s), and you can even play solo if you want!

💬 A Message from the Developers


We are a small indie team of two passionate people, determined to offer you a fun and chaotic gaming experience, perfect for solo play or sharing live. We don't claim to offer you a 100-hour blockbuster with endless side quests. Instead, we offer you Turbo Live, a game with a unique experience that suits you.

Turbo Live is free (and always will be) and offers extensive customization thanks to DLCs. You have the freedom to install the DLCs that interest you to enrich your experience. Additionally, we are committed to continuously adding free and paid content, taking your feedback into account to improve the game over time.

💖Did you enjoy Turbo Live or want to follow the project?


  • 💌 You can provide feedback on our Discord to improve the game
  • 👉 You can join our social networks or share it with your friends
